A defensive technique where chakra kneaded inside the body is converted into water and then expelled from the mouth in a dense, curved torrent, near-instantaneously creating a circular barricade that can be used to intercept incoming attacks. 

In her battle against [[Madara Uchiha]], Mei was able to use this to overpower and extinguish his [[Fire Release: Great Fire Destruction]] — a feat that would normally require many Water Release users working in tandem.
